item.title: Anomalies in bank transactions
item.description: Recently I’ve noticed suspicious transactions in my history that were initiated by some shady company that provides as the put it “opportunity to shop with discount” for their subscribers. Some web-shop had small font checkbox that initiated this subscription. Looks like the whole business model of such companies based on people who don’t check their transaction histories often. Needless to say, there were no subscription confirmation email, monthly bill or - most importantly - discounts I was supposed to receive.

item.title: Securing Flask web applications
item.description: I’ve just recently finished a web security training and in this post I’d like to investigate security mechanisms of my beloved web framework - Flask.I’ll go through different types of possible vulnerabilities and the way they can be mitigated.
